data.price: Kandi ntimukagenzwe n’ubwononyi ubwo ari bwo bwose kw’isi, inyuma y’aho Imana Allah Iyitunganirije ku kurungika Intumwa (za nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), ikabungabungwa hisunzwe iyumviramana; muheze kandi muyitumbere mu kuyisaba mutayibangikanya, mutinya ibihano vyayo, mwizera n’indishi kuri Yo. Mu vy’ukuri impuhwe z’Imana Allah, ziri hafi cane y’abagwaneza.
data.arabic: وَلَا تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بَعۡدَ إِصۡلَٰحِهَا وَٱدۡعُوهُ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعًاۚ إِنَّ رَحۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

dua.name: Dua for Environmental Consciousness
dua.significanceReason: Encourages responsible stewardship of natural resources and environmental protection.
